General.Name: Mawson Infrastructure Group Inc
General.Description: Mawson Infrastructure Group Inc. develops and operates digital infrastructure for digital currency on the bitcoin blockchain network in the United States. It engages in digital currency or bitcoin self-mining, customer co-location and related services, and energy markets, as well as operates data center facilities. The company is based in Midland, Pennsylvania.
General.Address: 950 Railroad Avenue, Midland, PA, United States, 15059
